Anglophones
(en) Bill Harry, The Paul McCartney Encyclopedia, Londres, Virgin, 2002, 935 p. (ISBN 978-0-7535-0716-2).
(en) Jonathan Gould, Can't Buy Me Love : The Beatles, Britain and America, New York, Three Rivers Press, 2007, 661 p. (ISBN 978-0-307-35338-2).
(en) Mark Lewisohn, The Beatles Recording Sessions, New York, Harmony Books, 1988, 204 p. (ISBN 0-517-57066-1).
